1.name: Project Meta
1.description: A web-based task management application developed for small teams.
1.details: Project Meta features real-time collaboration tools, task tracking, file sharing, and a simple, intuitive interface. Built with Laravel and Vue.js, it supports role-based access, enabling users to efficiently manage projects, delegate tasks, and track progress.

2.name: Project Astra
2.description: A customizable e-commerce platform for fashion retailers.
2.details: Project Astra offers a responsive design, multi-currency support, and integrated payment gateways. Developed using Laravel and Livewire, it includes an admin dashboard for inventory management, sales analytics, and customer relationship management.

3.name: Project Omega
3.description: A content management system for bloggers and small publishers.
3.details: Project Omega provides an easy-to-use interface for creating and managing blog posts, media galleries, and user comments. Itâ€™s built with Laravel and Tailwind CSS, supporting SEO optimization, social media integration, and multilingual content.

4.name: Project Delta
4.description: A B2B e-commerce site for wholesale electronics distribution.
4.details: Project Delta includes features like bulk ordering, tiered pricing, and supplier management. The platform is built with Laravel and Bootstrap, supporting multiple payment methods, real-time order tracking, and a custom API for third-party integrations.

5.name: Project Zeta
5.description: A student information system for educational institutions.
5.details: Project Zeta offers modules for attendance tracking, grade management, and communication between teachers, students, and parents. Built with Laravel and React, it includes a secure login system, automated report generation, and a mobile-responsive design.

6.name: Project Theta
6.description: An online marketplace for handcrafted goods.
6.details: Project Theta allows artisans to set up their shops, list products, and manage orders. Developed using Laravel and Alpine.js, it features a user-friendly dashboard, product reviews, seller profiles, and secure payment processing through Stripe and PayPal.
